info.title: team01-api-perpustakaan Express-rest API Swagger Documentation
info.description: Development For Challange Binar Chapter 5 FSW1 Team1 Fullstack Dashboard for a library designed to manage library data and a library website utilizing, Express.js as the backend and Postgress as the Database Management System (DBMS). Github: [TEAM1-API-PERPUSTAKAAN](https://github.com/RizqGyx/TEAM1-API-PERPUSTAKAAN)
